title: Watch Face PathTime
summary: Interactive, custom watch face menu, background colors and more other options.
developerAddress:
proizd Voenniy 6
Kherson, Khersons'ka oblast 73000
Ukraine
description: Watch face for smartwatches with:- steps counter;- battery level(watch/smartphone);- smartphone state info (Vibration mode; WiFi/Data connectivity);- missed calls and SMS counters;- launcher apps from smartwatch on smartphone; - built-in calendar;- stopwatch with tachymeter;- steps-B counter;- second time (GMT timelines);- custom background colors (gradient, 2 colors);- custom watch hands;Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.Configuration supported languages- English- Français- Deutsch- Українська- Русский- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face for smartwatches with:
- steps counter;
- battery level(watch/smartphone);
- smartphone state info (Vibration mode; WiFi/Data connectivity);
- missed calls and SMS counters;
- launcher apps from smartwatch on smartphone;
- built-in calendar;
- stopwatch with tachymeter;
- steps-B counter;
- second time (GMT timelines);
- custom background colors (gradient, 2 colors);
- custom watch hands;

Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).
Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
comments: Very disappointed, give all permissions and watch face crashes always. Not recommend to anybody. Don't buy it is a waste of your money
This is the only watch face I use it's customer to my colors, granting permission, not a problem
Pretty nice. Five stars when the battery levels colors can be changed as well as the fonts for dates, steps etc.
Good and Nice Looking but need improvement Occasionally i got the "disconnect moment" got freeze message in my moto 360 2nd that i need to configure the setting via android wear app
recentChanges: - AM/PM indicator (day number - top or bottom);
